data.name: Mists of Noyah Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Mists of Noyah - Original Soundtrack


The official soundtrack contains all the pieces from the musical universe of Mists of Noyah, totalizing more than two hours of carefully composed and crafted music for the players' best experience.

From the gentle and delicate melodies of calm and peaceful moments, to the swift rhythms and relentless chords of the most epic battles, join this unforgettable musical journey – in Noyah or in your own worlds!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2 GB available space
